content: yarn himalaya dolphin baby 100 g 131 yd/120 m 100% polyester yarn need 1 skein color any hook size 4 5 mm crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge size adult sizes eu 36-43 uk 3-9 for different sizes see page 5 size may also depend on the shape of the feet gauge 14 single_crochet / 14 row = 4 10 cm this pattern is inspired by this video https //youtu be/taagzbhpqso
